name: ssphlOLD
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, ccbn)), wcel(c1, chlo))
bodyPretty: ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ CBan)→ c1 ∈ CHilOLD)

stmt.origin: sylanbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, ccbn)), wcel(c1, chlo), wcel(c1, ccbn), wcel(c1, ccphlo))
stmt.pretty: sylanbrc((c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ CBan), c1 ∈ CHilOLD, c1 ∈ CBan, c1 ∈ CPreHilOLD)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, ccbn)), wcel(c1, chlo))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, ccbn)), wcel(c1, ccbn))

-| wb(wcel(c1, chlo), wa(wcel(c1, ccbn), wcel(c1, ccphlo)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ CBan)→ c1 ∈ CHilOLD)

⊣ ((c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ CBan)→ c1 ∈ CPreHilOLD)
⊣ (c1 ∈ CHilOLD ↔(c1 ∈ CBan ∧ c1 ∈ CPreHilOLD))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, ccphlo))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(css, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1 ∈ CPreHilOLD)
⊣ c2 =(SubSp ` c0)

comment: Obsolete version of ~ cphssphl as of 6-Oct-2022. A Banach subspace of an inner product space is a Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 11-Apr-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
